name: Critical Raw Materials Alliance
membership: The CRM Alliance is a member of the Minor Metals Trade Association (http://www.mmta.co.uk/)
goal: The Critical Raw Material Alliance promotes the importance of critical materials to the EU and supports a critical materials policy.
interests: Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: CRM list review, REACH, Trade, circular economy, rohs, non toxic environment
